content: Please specify the object attribute that corresponds to the group name.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a tooltip that informs users about the required attribute for LDAP group name input. It appears as a tooltip when the "LDAP Group Name Attribute" field has an error and needs user attention. Translators should provide a clear explanation of this concept in their native language to assist users with LDAP configuration.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'الرجاء تحديد ميزة الهدف التي تتوافق مع اسم المجموعة.' is a literal translation that doesn't quite capture the intended meaning. 'ميزة الهدف' (mazehdif) can be interpreted as 'target feature' which is not accurate in this context. The user is being asked to specify an attribute, not a target feature.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: الرجاء تحديد السمة التي تتوافق مع اسم المجموعة.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the phrase 'ميزة الهدف' sounds slightly awkward and less natural in this context. A more fluent phrasing would improve the user experience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: الرجاء تحديد السمة التي تتوافق مع اسم المجموعة.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'joska vastaa' is grammatically awkward. 'Jos' would be a more natural fit.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ole hyvä ja määrittele objektiattribuutti, jos vastaa ryhmän nimeä.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Ti preghiamo di specificare' is a bit formal and could be softened for better user experience. While grammatically correct, it sounds somewhat stiff.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Specifica l'attributo dell'oggetto che corrisponde al nome del gruppo.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Indicați atributul obiectului de grup care corespunde numelui de grup' is a bit literal and clunky. While technically correct, it doesn't flow naturally in Romanian. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the attribute used *for* the group name.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Specificați atributul obiectului care conține numele grupului.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'de grup' is repeated. While not technically incorrect, it feels slightly redundant.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider restructuring to avoid repetition, e.g., 'Specificați atributul obiectului care reprezintă numele grupului.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'කරුවා' is unnecessary and makes the sentence sound awkward.  The intended verb is 'කරන්න'.
The phrase 'වසතුවෙහි' is grammatically awkward. 'වස්තුවෙහි' is slightly better, but 'වස්තුව' is more natural in this context.
While technically correct, 'අනුරූප වස්තුවෙහි' feels too literal and stiff. A more natural translation of 'corresponds to' would be something like 'පාට'.
The word 'одговара' could be improved. While technically correct, it sounds a bit formal in this context. A more natural phrasing might be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Молимо наведите атрибут објекта који представља име групе.
